UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: ZL-2, a cathelicidin-derived antimicrobial peptide, has a broad antimicrobial activity against gram-positive bacteria and gram-negative bacteria in vitro and in vivo
Literature.Author: Tu J, Wu G, Zuo Y, Zhao L, Wang S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=8µg/ml)
